function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited research on accuracy of people detection and inter-people distance estimation in crowds","Impact":"Increased risk of inaccurate detection and estimation of social distancing in crowded environments, leading to potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough research and experimentation on challenging datasets to establish accurate detection and estimation methods","Technologies":"Advanced computer vision algorithms, deep learning models, and data augmentation techniques","People":"General public, especially in crowded areas","Owner":"Research institutions, technology companies, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of standard comparison on common datasets for people detection and distance estimation","Impact":"Absence of benchmarking and standard evaluation of people detection systems, resulting in varied performance and lack of consistency","Mitigation":"Establish standard evaluation protocols for benchmarking people detection systems on common datasets","Technologies":"Open-source datasets, evaluation metrics, and crowd simulation software","People":"Researchers, industry experts, and government agencies","Owner":"Research institutions and government agencies"},{"Description":"No analytical studies or post-processing to analyze the risk of infection distribution after people detection","Impact":"Failure to identify and mitigate the risk of virus spread in public spaces despite accurate people detection, leading to potential transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Develop post-detection and post-processing analytical solutions to assess infection risk and take proactive measures","Technologies":"Statistical modeling, risk analysis algorithms, and infection spread simulation software","People":"Public health officials, facility managers, and policymakers","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions, and government agencies"}]}
